welcome_message_body: Welcome to Baton Rouge, the charming capital city of Louisiana! Get ready to experience our rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore all that Baton Rouge has to offer and enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: Serops Express
restaurants.description: Serops Express is a greek restaurant located in Baton Rouge.

restaurants.name: Anthony's Italian Deli
restaurants.description: Anthony's Italian Deli is a italian restaurant located in Baton Rouge.

restaurants.name: Superior Grill
restaurants.description: Superior Grill is a mexican restaurant located in Baton Rouge.

restaurants.name: Bistro Byronz
restaurants.description: Bistro Byronz is a southern food restaurant located in Baton Rouge.
restaurants.address: 5412 Government St (at St Landry St), Baton Rouge, LA 70806

restaurants.name: Thai Pepper
restaurants.description: Thai Pepper is a thai restaurant located in Baton Rouge.
restaurants.address: 5958 Florida Blvd (at Ardenwood Dr), Baton Rouge, LA 70806

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is dedicated to domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
